meanings.definition: Not able to be changed or altered.
meanings.sent1: The rules of the game are unchangeable once set.
meanings.sent2: Her opinion on the matter is unchangeable.
meanings.sent3: The unchangeable weather forecast predicted rain all week.
meanings.sent4: His unchangeable decision to quit surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unchangeable laws of nature govern our universe.

meanings.sent1: The unchangeable melody played on repeat.
meanings.sent2: Despite the chaos, his expression remained unchangeable.
meanings.sent3: The unchangeable clock always runs five minutes late.
meanings.sent4: Her unchangeable smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The unchangeable mountain stood tall for centuries.
